title: Funny feline pawrent sets up camera in their cat's food bowl, goes viral for the 24/7 silly snack surveillance at nom-nom central
description: Howdy there, feline fam. One of the things we love doing most as a cat pawrent is taking silly pictures of our cats. We love taking pictures of them when they are in full airplane mode, when they fall asleep in purrfectly silly pawsitions, those ameowzing up-close-and-purrsonal angles, and especially the outrageously silly 0.5x zoom pics. They're already so cute and funny-looking that any pawpportunity we have to make them look even sillier, we take it without hesitation.One genius cat owner took this topic to the next level - by adding a secret camera to their cat's food bowl and to catch their nomming up close. Let us just sayâ€¦we're really mad we didn't think about this first. These pictures are the literal definition of purrfection. Ladies, gentlemen, and friends of the feline-variety, you are witnessing the birth of a new meme. Take a second to soak it in (and laugh at how hissterical these cat pictures are). Scroll down to enjoy more of this hilarious POV and some of the comedic comments below. Enjoy!
author: Blake Seidel
excerpt: Funny feline pawrent sets up camera in their cat's food bowl, goes viral for the 24/7 silly snack surveillance at nom-nom central - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals
text: It's not an exaggeration to say that we are obsessed with these pictures. Everything about them from the purrfectly exaggerated pawportions to the ameowzingly silly faces, we just can't get enough. We could scroll through hundreds, nay, thousands of these pictures without getting bored. Excuse us while we go buy a camera to install in our cats' feeders. Best investment ever! Members of the community weighed in with their reactions and silly additions. Prepurr yourselves for memes aplenty, and all the hissterical reactions you know and love from our fellow feline fanatics. Keep scrolling below for their comments and for more stories like this, feel free to take a look at this one about the cat community describing their cats' toxic traits.
html:
It's not an exaggeration to say that we are obsessed with these pictures. Everything about them from the purrfectly exaggerated pawportions to the ameowzingly silly faces, we just can't get enough. We could scroll through hundreds, nay, thousands of these pictures without getting bored. Excuse us while we go buy a camera to install in our cats' feeders. Best investment ever!

Members of the community weighed in with their reactions and silly additions. Prepurr yourselves for memes aplenty, and all the hissterical reactions you know and love from our fellow feline fanatics. Keep scrolling below for their comments and for more stories like this, feel free to take a look at this one about the cat community describing their cats' toxic traits.
